title: How to Do Zephyr’s Leap and Zephyr’s Ascent Achievements in Guild Wars 2

steps.headline: Collect stacks of the "Assisted Leap" temporary ability.
steps.description: Collect the maximum number of stacks you can by walking over the Assisted Leap node multiple times.

steps.headline: Be aware of the remaining duration of the ability and when it stops increasing start your ascent.
steps.description: At a certain point, you won't be able to collect more stacks and the game will not refresh the duration of the ability after that point.

steps.headline: Ascend to the base of the cliff.
steps.description: Start your ascent to the base of the cliff required for this achievement by using the assisted leap ability once to reach the initial foothold.

steps.headline: Walk to the second ledge and use a second assisted leap to get to the top of the ledge.
Walk to the base of the cliff and position yourself under the ship debris that looks like an "H".
Ascend the cliff.
steps.description: Jump to the top of the first foothold.

steps.headline: Use an assisted leap to reach the second foothold.
Use another assisted leap to reach the third and final foothold.
Use a third assisted leap to reach the jutting beam directly above the third foothold.
steps.description: This part is particularly tricky and may take several tries.

steps.headline: Choose your next approach from two possibilities.
steps.description:
At this point you have two options:
Use the rest of your assisted leaps and reach the top the easy way. Jump to the top of the cliff as intended.

steps.headline: Finish Zephyr’s ascent and start or complete Zephyr’s Leap.
steps.description: To complete this double helping of horrible, move to the east side of the cliff (it should be right in front of you).

steps.headline: Get on the sail hanging over the cliff and move to it's left-most corner.
Wait for the clouds to clear so you can make sure you're over the hay and jump.

text:
Collect stacks of the "Assisted Leap" temporary ability. Collect the maximum number of stacks you can by walking over the Assisted Leap node multiple times. Be aware of the remaining duration of the ability and when it stops increasing start your ascent. At a certain point, you won't be able to collect more stacks and the game will not refresh the duration of the ability after that point. Ascend to the base of the cliff. Start your ascent to the base of the cliff required for this achievement by using the assisted leap ability once to reach the initial foothold. Walk to the second ledge and use a second assisted leap to get to the top of the ledge.  Walk to the base of the cliff and position yourself under the ship debris that looks like an "H".  Ascend the cliff. Jump to the top of the first foothold. Use an assisted leap to reach the second foothold.  Use another assisted leap to reach the third and final foothold.  Use a third assisted leap to reach the jutting beam directly above the third foothold. This part is particularly tricky and may take several tries. Choose your next approach from two possibilities. At this point you have two options:
Use the rest of your assisted leaps and reach the top the easy way. Jump to the top of the cliff as intended. Finish Zephyr’s ascent and start or complete Zephyr’s Leap. To complete this double helping of horrible, move to the east side of the cliff (it should be right in front of you). Get on the sail hanging over the cliff and move to it's left-most corner.  Wait for the clouds to clear so you can make sure you're over the hay and jump.  Finished!
